    • Method Detail

      • newRules

        public static Rules newRules()
        Singleton Caller This method creates a new rules instance, if it hasn't already been done
        Returns:
        a new Rules object that is a singleton object

      • checkAllRules

        public boolean checkAllRules(Die die,
                             int row,
                             int column,
                             Grid grid)
        Rules Checker This method checks the correct application of rules
        Parameters:
        die - it is the die whose setting rules (in position=row,column) must be checked
        row - is the row of the grid in which i want to place the die (die)
        column - is the column of the grid in which i want to place the die (param die)
        grid - it's the grid of which I have to check the rules. This method checks if is possible to place a die (param die) in (row,column) in the grid (param grid).
        Returns:
        true if all the rules have been respected and no otherwise.

      • checkExceptionColorRules

        public boolean checkExceptionColorRules(Die die,
                                        int row,
                                        int column,
                                        Grid grid)
        ExceptionColors Checker This method is used to verify all rules except the color rules
        Parameters:
        die - it is the die whose rules must be checked
        row - is the row in the grid of the adding of the die in the grid
        column - is the column in the grid of the adding of the die in the grid
        grid - the grid whose rules must be checked
        Returns:
        true if all the rules except the color placement rules are respected in case that the die is to be placed in the position (param:row, param:column)

      • checkAllPlacementRules

        public boolean checkAllPlacementRules(Die die,
                                      int row,
                                      int column,
                                      Grid grid)
        All Placement Rules Checker This method checks all placement rules are respected
        Parameters:
        die - it is the die whose placement rules must be checked
        row - is the row of the possible placement in the grid
        column - is the column of the possible placement in the grid
        grid - is the grid whose placement rules must be checked
        Returns:
        a boolean value that is true when all the placement rules have been respected and false otherwise

      • checkAllExceptAdjacency

        public boolean checkAllExceptAdjacency(Die die,
                                       int row,
                                       int column,
                                       Grid grid)
        All Placement Except Adjacency Rules Checker This method checks all placement rules are respected except adjacency ones
        Parameters:
        die - it is the die whose placement rules must be checked
        row - is the row of the possible placement in the grid
        column - is the column of the possible placement in the grid
        grid - is the grid whose placement rules must be checked
        Returns:
        a boolean value that is true when all the placement rules have been respected and false otherwise

      • checkNotAdjacency

        public boolean checkNotAdjacency(Die die,
                                 int row,
                                 int column,
                                 Grid grid)
        Not Adjacency Rules Checker This method checks adjacency rules are not respected
        Parameters:
        die - it is the die whose placement rules must be checked
        row - is the row of the possible placement in the grid
        column - is the column of the possible placement in the grid
        grid - is the grid whose placement rules must be checked
        Returns:
        a boolean value that is true when all the placement rules have been respected and false otherwise

      • checkExceptionValueRules

        public boolean checkExceptionValueRules(Die dice,
                                        int line,
                                        int column,
                                        Grid grid)
        ExceptionValue Checker This method is used to verify any value exception
        Parameters:
        dice - it is the die whose rules must be checked
        line - is the line in the grid of the adding of the Die in the grid
        column - is the column in the grid of the adding of the Die in the grid
        grid - the grid whose rules must be checked
        Returns:
        true if all the rules except the value placement rules are respected in case that the die is to be placed in the position (param:line, param:column)
